metadata.name: Potential Script Proxy Execution Via CL_Mutexverifiers.ps1
metadata.comment: Detects the use of the Microsoft signed script "CL_mutexverifiers" to proxy the execution of additional PowerShell script commands

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\pwsh.exe'))) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -nologo -windowstyle minimized -file ')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\appdata\\local\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\temp\\'))))

output.summary: Detects the use of the Microsoft signed script "CL_mutexverifiers" to proxy the execution of additional PowerShell script commands
